description:
Eight-Six is out of the picture, and the RedSuns take advantage of the opportunity. Ryosuke returns with his White Comet to take on Kyoichi, Team Emperor’s experienced leader.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: ACT.7 赤城バトル 白と黒の閃光!
Akagi Battle Shiro to Kuro no Senkou!
Course à Akagi : éclair noir, éclair blanc !
